text: - As Amazonians, we are not happy
with the status quo.
So there's always innovation,
there's always experimentation,

not only with our products
but also within the company,
from an organization standpoint.
(lively music)

My name is Jan.
(light upbeat music)

I'm part of the Solutions
Architecture team
in Amazon Web Services.
So when I joined in 2015,

our primary focus back then
was to lay the groundwork,

making sure that our customers
they understand what cloud is
and how it can benefit their business.
I left AWS around 2020,
but for me I was looking
for something a little bit different,
looking for new experiences.
I returned around 2021.

One of the biggest reasons
for me to come back to AWS

was the chance to work with
a lot of like-minded people.
One of the things that really stands out
is customer obsession.

And you can actually
see customer obsession
as you work with the different Amazonians,
and this is something that I really enjoy
day in and day out.

One of the things that
I miss is the culture
of innovation and experimentation.
I think this is something really valuable

and this is something that
I wish a lot of companies
do a lot more.

If this is something that
you are interested in,
come build with us.
